items.title: Israel-Palestine: the bereaved parents bringing hope to a divided land
bullets: • Palestinians and Israelis are working to build peace where politics has failed
• They are united in loss: specifically, the loss of a child
• Something else unites them: a determination to build bridges of shared understanding
• The fighting has to end, and bereaved parents are better placed than most to achieve that

items.title: Why do only some leaves turn red in the fall? Scientists can't agree on an answer
bullets: • Scientists can't agree on why only some autumn leaves turn red in the fall
• Every autumn, trees break down chlorophyll in their leaves to recover precious nitrogen before the leaves fall
• The loss of this chlorophll exposes yellow pigments that have been there in the leaves all along

items.title: California man who survived 20 days in snowy wilderness says it was walk or die
bullets: • Ron Dailey went missing in the Sierra national forest in Fresno county after taking a solo hunting trip there on 13 October
• Dailey's pickup truck broke down while he was at an elevation of more than 10,000ft, stranding him there with what he estimated to be about two weeks’ worth of food and water

items.title: Trump once again nominates tech space traveler Jared Isaacman to serve as NASA administrator
bullets: • Trump once again nominates tech space traveler Jared Isaacman to serve as NASA administrator

• Trump announced in late May that he had decided to withdraw Isaacman after a "thorough review" of his "prior associations" Weeks after the withdrawal, Trump went further in expressing his concerns about Isaacman's Republican credentials
• Trump made no mention of his previous decision to nominate Isaacman in his Tuesday evening announcement

• Researchers say nickel vapor was detected in the gas surrounding the comet

items.title: Full Avengers: Doomsday Cast Announcement Breakdown
bullets: • Marvel fans were treated to a live stream on the Marvel Entertainment YouTube Account, though the video ended up being over 5 hours long, it revealed the full cast for the upcoming Avengers: Doomsday cast

items.title: Halo Infinite is about to get its last major update
bullets: • On November 18th, Operation: Infinite will be released for Halo Infinite players with a battle pass and lots of new customizations
• This month’s content update is its last, as the team focuses on ‘multiple’ Halo titles in development
• The game was eventually delayed another year to late 2021

items.title: Maybe Peloton is its own worst enemy
bullets: • Every time there’s good news, Peloton always seems to follow it up with a recall, layoff, or some other gaffe
• The company issued yet another recall for 833,000 of its original Bike Plus units, before posting its Q1 2026 results after the markets closed at 4 o'clock

• Only a small fraction of the new currency is available for purchase from the shop

items.title: Blackmagic’s free camera app can now stream directly to YouTube and Twitch
bullets: • Blackmagic’s free camera app can now stream directly to YouTube, Twitch, and Vimeo
• The update also adds support for SRT: a more modern streaming protocol frequently used by professional broadcasters
• Blackmagic Camera also gains support for custom RTMP and SRT servers for streamers wanting alternatives

items.title: Anker’s 521 PowerHouse can power up to six devices, and it’s on sale
bullets: • The Anker 521 PowerHouse is a portable backup battery with a 256Wh capacity and six ports
• The 256Wh power station delivers up to 300-watts of power, so you can charge phones and even run small appliances like a mini fridge, lamp, or a fan
• Anker also says the battery is designed to last up to 10 years, and you get a five-year warranty

items.title: Steam store pages are wider now
bullets: • Steam store pages will be wider from "940 pixels to now 1200 pixels, Valve says

• The new pages are designed to fit on tablets and mobile devices, the company says
• Changes follow improvements to the Steam Trailer Player for store pages in July
